articles.title: EU states approve world's first comprehensive crypto rules
articles.description: European Union states on Tuesday gave the final nod to the world's first comprehensive set of rules to regulate cryptoassets on Tuesday, piling pressure on countries such as Britain and the United States to play catch up.
articles.content: May 16 (Reuters) - European Union states on Tuesday gave the final nod to the world's first comprehensive set of rules to regulate cryptoassets on Tuesday, piling pressure on countries such as Britai… [+1699 chars]
